comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: These German warships are photographed heading to internment at the Royal Navy base at Scapa Flow, Scotland. Rather than allow their ships to fall into Allied hands as per the terms of the Treaty of Versailles, the officers and sailors of the Germany Navy would successfully scuttle 52 out of 74 of their interned ships on June 21, 1919 in Scapa Flow. See: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scuttling_of_the_German_fleet_in_Sc...
